question: Saying Talaq in ones Dream
answer:
QUESTION

 

if someone say talaq in his dream what is that meanning are is accountable

ANSWER


Share:

 

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

The utterance of talāq in ones dream is not valid.

 

 (Fataawa Mahmudiya V-12, P-294 Faruqiyah)

(Raddul Muhtaar V-3, P-242-243 Saeed)

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum
